name: Albato
description: Albato is an AI-driven no-code integration platform that connects apps and automates workflows without coding.
longDescription: Albato is an AI-driven no-code integration platform (iPaaS) designed to simplify API integrations and make them accessible to users without technical expertise. It enables seamless connections between over 800 apps, allowing for data synchronization and automated workflows in just minutes. The platform's mission is to empower businesses and individuals to build efficient SaaS ecosystems without relying on developers. By addressing challenges like manual data handling and app silos, Albato enhances productivity through user-friendly tools and scalable automation. It integrates with AI tools such as OpenAI to enable smarter, more intelligent automations. Additionally, Albato prioritizes security with SOC 2 Type 2 compliance, ensuring reliable and confidential operations.
features: Albato offers an AI-driven no-code integration platform that enables users to connect apps and automate workflows without any coding required, making automation accessible to all.
Users can set up integrations quickly in just 5 minutes with a safe and straightforward process, saving time and reducing complexity.
The platform supports trigger and action-based integrations, allowing users to customize automations based on specific events and desired outcomes.
It solves complex automation problems by enabling the creation of ecosystems across dozens of apps, facilitating comprehensive workflow management.
The step-by-step Automation Builder simplifies the integration of cloud apps, eliminating the need for developer involvement.
Albato features a user-friendly interface that caters to both technical and non-technical users, ensuring ease of use.
It provides 24/7 customer support in multiple languages with fast response times, helping users resolve issues promptly.
The data migration feature allows for the transfer of large sets of historical data between apps, streamlining data management.
Native integrations with over 800 apps, including AI tools like OpenAI, Synthesia, and Writesonic, expand its versatility.
Internal tools such as Delays, Find and Replace, JSON parser, and formatting for dates and numbers enhance the functionality of automations.
Albato is SOC 2 Type 2 compliant, ensuring high standards of security, processing integrity, confidentiality, and privacy for users.
Users can suggest new integrations at any time, allowing the platform to evolve based on community needs.
The free plan has no time limit, and a 7-day free trial is available without requiring a credit card, making it easy to get started.

faqs.question: What is Albato?
faqs.answer: Albato is an AI-driven no-code integration platform (iPaaS) for automating workflows by connecting apps.

faqs.question: Do I need coding skills to use Albato?
faqs.answer: No, Albato is designed for no-code integration, requiring no coding skills.

faqs.question: How long does it take to set up an integration?
faqs.answer: It takes about 5 minutes to connect apps and set up integrations.

faqs.question: Is there a free plan available?
faqs.answer: Yes, there is a free plan with no time limit, and a 7-day free trial with no credit card required.

faqs.question: How many apps can I integrate with Albato?
faqs.answer: Albato supports integrations with over 800 available apps.

faqs.question: What kind of support does Albato offer?
faqs.answer: Albato provides 24/7 customer support across multiple languages with fast response times.

faqs.question: Is my data secure with Albato?
faqs.answer: Yes, Albato is SOC 2 Type 2 compliant, prioritizing security, processing integrity, confidentiality, and privacy.

faqs.question: Can I migrate historical data using Albato?
faqs.answer: Yes, Albato offers a data migration feature for transferring large sets of historical data.

faqs.question: How does Albato compare to Zapier?
faqs.answer: Albato is described as a strong alternative to Zapier, with a simple UI, good pricing, and extensive integrations.

faqs.question: Can I suggest new app integrations?
faqs.answer: Yes, users can easily suggest new integrations at any time.
